^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Name.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the name of the Battery sensor.

SensorNumber.description: A numerical identifier to represent the Battery sensor.
SensorNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a numerical identifier for this Battery sensor that is unique within this resource.
